column4: Question: I installed Hardy w/ a 30GB WUBI install on a win2k box. It loaded fine, multiple times... yesterday. Today, bootup is stuck on a busybox/initramfs error: "/build/buildd/linux-2.6.24/drivers/hid/usbhid/hid-core.c: couldn't find an input interrupt endpoint"
Any idea what the problem is?
looks like a faulty usb device, maybe
the only USB devices I have attached are KB/M
